headline: Show HN: Exabox – Essential Tools for Developers (macOS/Windows)
description:
Hey HN,

I'd like to introduce you exabox, a side project I've been working on in the last few months. It is a set of tools for developers: convert and format JSON, YAML, TOML, encode and decode Base64, generate fake data, parse JWT, transform text using multiple rules, and many more. All in a single app.

What exabox has to offer compared to other similar apps:

- It works entirely offline - Buy once and keep it forever (no recurring subscriptions or in-app purchases) - It is available for macOS and Windows (and soon Linux as well) - There is a full-featured free web version - You can personalize the UI

The free web version is available here: https://tools.exabox.app/

I'm expanding it and adding more tools and features. Here is the roadmap: https://github.com/albemala/exabox-app/issues

I'd be interested in hearing what you think about exabox. Questions? Concerns? Suggestions? Thank you in advance!
